## IKeywordArgumentCommonOptions.metavar property

A metavariable for the flag used in help text generation. Defaults to [IKeywordArgumentCommonOptions.dest](./program-builder.ikeywordargumentcommonoptions.dest.md)<!-- -->.

